### About this site

This site is created for P8105 homework 4. It is made in Rmarkdown, and it's hosted in my github repository. By clicking on the octocat button on the upper right corner of this webpage, you will be directed to my github homepage, and the source cods of this website can be found in "hh2767.github.io" repository.

The plots in this website are made with plotly, and many functions in the "tidyverse" packge are used in the data cleaning process.
